### Pull Request Type

- [ ] **Feature(s)**
- [ ] **Bug Fix(es)**
- [ ] **Minor Change(s)** (Docs/UI)

### Checklist

- [ ] Does this PR solve the **issue(s)**?
- [ ] Has it been **tested**?
- [ ] Is the UI **consistent**?
- [ ] Are **translations** updated (if applicable)?
- [ ] Have the changes been ported to mobile (if not, we will handle it)?
